page.title: 03PLAYGROUND GAMES WE ENJOY
page.content: One of the games the girls like to play is Red Letter .This is how we play it.We all line up and there is 1 person at the other end of the playground.The person says "The{Red {letter}is A"for instance,and that means that you can't move when that person says A.Then she will say a lot of letters and we move 1 space if the letter is in our name.The first one to the other end is the winner. Another game we like to play is{Chain {Hit}.One person is hit and they run around trying to catch the other children.When they catch somebody they hold hands with the person who is hit and run around catching everyone else.The first person to be caught is hit for next time. 2 other games we enjoy are Station and London.
